name: Run away from pocket!!!!
description:
So you are basically a fluff of dust who lives in the great world of the pocket, but you want to get

out, you will need to face many dangerous and unfriendly creatures who will try to devastate you, but

you try to run up to your freedom. You also meet some friends who will help you with the escape!

Be aware of danger and have a great adventure through the pocket!
